h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Back Scratcher Location
content: The Back Scratcher can be purchased from the Shrine store in Black Wind Mountain, after completing Chapter 1. Once you have reached a Shrine in Yellow Wind Ridge in Chapter 2, simply head back to Black Wind Mountain, use the Shrine, enter the store and it will be waiting there for you to buy.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Back_Scratcher.md', within the main section titled 'Back Scratcher', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Back Scratcher Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Back Scratcher can be purchased from the Shrine store in Black Wind Mountain, after completing Chapter 1. Once you have reached a Shrine in Yellow Wind Ridge in Chapter 2, simply head back to Black Wind Mountain, use the Shrine, enter the store and it will be waiting there for you to buy.
